publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-780 Stewart Stevenson: Abolition of Bridge Tolls (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Abolition of Bridge Tolls (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: John Swinney*, Jim Mather*

S3M-780 Stewart Stevenson: Abolition of Bridge Tolls (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Abolition of Bridge Tolls (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: John Swinney, Jim Mather
